data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample DONJEK-122

Exposition W, Slope 2 deg, Geology: Silikat Moränensch. und Torf, Tree line 1110 m, av. Tree height 15 m, Tree cover 50%, Shrub cover 50%, Herb cover 20%, Moss cover 100%, Vegatation type: Alt. schl. wüchs. Fi-Stao. auf alt. Torfboden, Film number: 729A
